definition: distinct/clear/orderly/pain/suffering/deciduous bush used in Chinese medicine (genus Vitex)/punishment cane (old)
surname Chu/abbr. for Hubei 湖北省[Hu2 bei3 Sheng3] and Hunan 湖南省[Hu2 nan2 Sheng3] provinces together/Chinese kingdom during the Spring and Autumn and Warring States Periods (722-221 BC)

surname Chu/abbr. for Hubei 湖北省[Hu2 bei3 Sheng3] and Hunan 湖南省[Hu2 nan2 Sheng3] provinces together/Chinese kingdom during the Spring and Autumn and Warring States Periods (722-221 BC)

sentences.english: After dinner, woman cooed some suggestive little sighs and slipped invitingly into bed.
sentences.chinese: 晚飯後，女人含情脈脈，楚楚動人的躺到牀上。

sentences.english: Cover marriage gauze originally luxuriant elegance, the bride of set off is more lovely.
sentences.chinese: 本套婚紗華麗典雅，映襯的新娘更加楚楚動人。

sentences.english: If still alive, she must now have been in the flush and bloom of early womanhood.
sentences.chinese: 如果她還活着，如今應該是個楚楚動人的少女了。

sentences.english: I knew exactly what was happening and wanted to tip her 10%.
sentences.chinese: 我對箇中奧妙知道得清清楚楚，想給她10%的小費。

sentences.english: He thought that he already distinctly perceived the brink of the bottomless abyss.
sentences.chinese: 他彷彿已清清楚楚地望見那無底深淵邊上的陡壁。

sentences.english: Do not intoxicating fragrance of the bamboo flowers, petals small, white and delicate and charming.
sentences.chinese: 竹花沒有醉人的馨香，花瓣很小，潔白而楚楚可憐。

sentences.english: Clearly he saw a T-crossing, lying in front of him.
sentences.chinese: 他清清楚楚地看見一條丁字街，橫在他眼前。

sentences.english: Delicate and finally put MeiFeng aunt to give away.
sentences.chinese: 楚楚終於把美鳳阿姨給送走了。

sentences.english: Specially contains the plant lip-care essence, which can make your lips more delicate, more charming and more attractive.
sentences.chinese: 特有植物護脣精華，使您的雙脣嬌嫩欲滴，楚楚動人。

sentences.english: He saw clearly a T-street to across before him.
sentences.chinese: 他清清楚楚地看見一條丁字街，橫在他眼前。

sentences.english: These two parts themselves clearly set off the meaning of the word.
sentences.chinese: 就把柘的意思表達得清清楚楚了。

sentences.english: He had not become a trim self-satisfied city man .
sentences.chinese: 他沒有變成一個衣冠楚楚，神氣十足的城裏人。

sentences.english: The facts are clear and brook no denial.
sentences.chinese: 事實清清楚楚，不容抵賴。

sentences.english: The tender broadness that the sun that changes new clothes also changes is elegant, lovely.
sentences.chinese: 換上新裝的太陽也變的溫柔闊雅，楚楚動人。

sentences.english: When she grew up to be a beautiful girl, many persons came to her home begging for marrying her.
sentences.chinese: 等她出落成楚楚動人的大姑娘時，前來求親的人很多。

sentences.english: Yeah,she got a roaring reputation because of her beauty.
sentences.chinese: 是的，楚楚動人的她獲得的好評如潮。
